meanings.definition: The muscular stomach of a bird, used for grinding food.
meanings.sent1: The chicken's gizzards help it break down its food.
meanings.sent2: I saw the chef cleaning the gizzards before cooking them.
meanings.sent3: The gizzards of the turkey were working hard after a big meal.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the gizzards of a bird, strong and relentless.
meanings.sent5: The gizzards of the duck were full of pebbles to aid in digestion.

meanings.definition: The digestive organ of a bird, located between the crop and the intestines.
meanings.sent1: The vet examined the bird's gizzards to check for any issues.
meanings.sent2: Birds rely on their gizzards to help digest their food effectively.
meanings.sent3: The gizzards of the parrot seemed to have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: His words went through her like the gizzards of a bird, breaking them down.
meanings.sent5: The gizzards of the robin were working overtime to process all the worms it ate.
